text: Guatteria ecuadorensis is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Muriel, P. & Pitman, N. 2003. Guatteria ecuadorensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
